entry.show: if (lvl=0 and tlt=0) then $VALUE=0 else $VALUE=1 endif
if (lvl=0 and tlt=0) then $VALUE=0 else $VALUE=1 endif

radio.label: Index
radio.set: $i=intmod if $i='full' then $VALUE=1 else if $i='partial' then $VALUE=0 else off('lifrq'):$VALUE endif endif

radio.label: Region
radio.set: $i=intmod if $i='partial' then $VALUE=1 else if $i='full' then $VALUE=0 else on('lifrq'):$VALUE endif endif

button.label: Re-Transform
button.vc: if arraydim>2.0*ni then wft2da(1) else wft2da endif

button.label: Re-Transform 2D
button.vc: if arraydim>2.0*ni2 then wft2da('ni2',1) else wft2da('ni2') endif

group.label: 2D/3D Parameters
group.show: if (ni>1 or ni2>1 or ni3>1) then $VALUE=1 else $VALUE=0 endif
